Question: What are the make and model of the vehicle with registration 'XYZ123' involved in the crime reported on January 1, 2022?
Cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle {reg:"XYZ123"})-[involved:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime:Crime {date:date("2022-01-01")})
RETURN vehicle, involved, crime, vehicle.make, vehicle.model
Rewrite: Can you provide the make and model of the vehicle registered under 'XYZ123' that was implicated in the crime on January 1, 2022?

Question: Can you provide the full name and age of the person with NHS number 'AB1234567' who has an email address ending in '@example.com'?
Cypher:
MATCH (person:Person {nhs_no:"AB1234567"})-[hasEmailRel:HAS_EMAIL]->(email:Email)
WHERE email.email_address ENDS WITH '@example.com'
RETURN person, hasEmailRel, email, person.name, person.surname, person.age
Rewrite: Could you supply the complete name and age of the individual whose NHS number is 'AB1234567' and possesses an email that concludes with '@example.com'?

Question: What type of crime and its last outcome are associated with the crime ID 'CR1234XA' that occurred in the postcode 'AB12 3CD'?
Cypher:
MATCH (crime:Crime {id:"CR1234XA"})-[:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)-[:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode {code:"AB12 3CD"})
RETURN crime, location, postcode, crime.type, crime.last_outcome
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (crime:Crime {id:"CR1234XA"})-[relation3:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)-[relation4:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode {code:"AB12 3CD"})
RETURN relation4, relation3, crime, location, postcode, crime.type, crime.last_outcome
Rewrite: What kind of criminal activity and final result correspond to the crime ID 'CR1234XA' that took place in the postcode 'AB12 3CD'?

Question: What is the model year and registration number of the vehicle found at the crime scene for the crime with ID 'CRIME1234'?
Cypher:
MATCH (crime:Crime {id:"CRIME1234"})<-[involved:INVOLVED_IN]-(vehicle:Vehicle)
RETURN crime, involved, vehicle, vehicle.year, vehicle.reg
Rewrite: What are the model year and registration number of the vehicle discovered at the crime scene associated with crime ID 'CRIME1234'?

Question: Display the names and badge numbers of officers who investigated crimes of type 'Burglary' in the postcode 'ZZ10 1XX'.
Cypher:
MATCH (crime:Crime {type:"Burglary"})-[investigated_by:INVESTIGATED_BY]->(officer:Officer), (crime)-[occurred_at:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)-[has_postcode:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode {code:"ZZ10 1XX"})
RETURN crime, investigated_by, officer, location, occurred_at, has_postcode, postcode, officer.name, officer.badge_no
Rewrite: Show the names and badge numbers of officers who conducted investigations into 'Burglary' in the postcode 'ZZ10 1XX'.

Question: Who is the registered owner of the phone number '02077778888' that made a call on the date of a major crime event on 'November 20, 2022'?
Cypher:
MATCH (phoneCall:PhoneCall {call_date: date('2022-11-20')})-[:CALLER]->(phone:Phone {phoneNo: '02077778888'}), 
      (phoneCall)-[:CALLED]->(phone),
      (owner:Person)-[:HAS_PHONE]->(phone),
      (crime:Crime {date: date('2022-11-20'), type: 'major'})-[:PARTY_TO]->(person:Person)
WHERE owner = person
RETURN phoneCall, phone, owner, owner.name, owner.surname
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (phoneCall:PhoneCall {call_date: date('2022-11-20')})-[relation5:CALLER]-(phone:Phone {phoneNo: '02077778888'}), 
      (phoneCall)-[relation6:CALLED]->(phone),
      (owner:Person)-[relation7:HAS_PHONE]->(phone),
      (crime:Crime {date: date('2022-11-20'), type: 'major'})-[relation8:PARTY_TO]->(person:Person)
WHERE owner = person
RETURN relation8, relation7, relation6, relation5, person, crime, phoneCall, phone, owner, owner.name, owner.surname
Rewrite: Who is listed as the owner of the telephone number '02077778888', which was used to make a call during the significant criminal incident on 'November 20, 2022'?

Question: What is the relationship type between 'John Doe' and 'Jane Smith' as per the 'FAMILY_REL' connection?
Cypher:
MATCH (johnDoe:Person {name:"John", surname:"Doe"})-[familyConnection:FAMILY_REL]->(janeSmith:Person {name:"Jane", surname:"Smith"})
RETURN johnDoe, familyConnection, janeSmith, familyConnection.rel_type
Rewrite: What type of familial relationship exists between 'John Doe' and 'Jane Smith' according to the 'FAMILY_REL' connection?

Question: Identify the connection type ('KNOWS_PHONE', 'KNOWS_SN', 'KNOWS', or 'KNOWS_LW') between person 'Alice Johnson' and 'Bob Williams' who are both linked to the same crime 'CR2567'.
Cypher:
MATCH (alice:Person {name:"Alice", surname:"Johnson"})-[:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime {id:"CR2567"})<-[:PARTY_TO]-(bob:Person {name:"Bob", surname:"Williams"})
MATCH (alice)-[connection:KNOWS_PHONE|KNOWS_SN|KNOWS|KNOWS_LW]->(bob)
RETURN alice, bob, crime, connection, alice.name, alice.surname, bob.name, bob.surname, connection
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (alice:Person {name:"Alice", surname:"Johnson"})-[relation3:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime {id:"CR2567"})<-[relation4:PARTY_TO]-(bob:Person {name:"Bob", surname:"Williams"})
MATCH (alice)-[connection:KNOWS_PHONE|KNOWS_SN|KNOWS|KNOWS_LW]->(bob)
RETURN relation4, relation3, alice, bob, crime, connection, alice.name, alice.surname, bob.name, bob.surname

Question: What are the nature of the calls (call_type) from 'PhoneCall' entity 'PC123' to 'Phone' entity 'PN456'?

Question: What connections does the crime with ID 'CRIM123' have with any officers through the 'INVESTIGATED_BY' relation?
Cypher:
MATCH (crime:Crime {id:"CRIM123"})-[investigatedBy:INVESTIGATED_BY]->(officer:Officer)
RETURN crime, investigatedBy, officer, officer.name, officer.surname, officer.rank
Rewrite: How is the crime labeled 'CRIM123' linked to any officers via the 'INVESTIGATED_BY' relationship?

Question: How many vehicles registered before 2010 are linked to more than one crime in our records?
Cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle)-[involved:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime:Crime)
WHERE vehicle.year < 2010
WITH vehicle, COUNT(crime) AS NumberOfCrimesLinked
WHERE NumberOfCrimesLinked > 1
RETURN COUNT(vehicle)
Rewrite: How many vehicles that were registered prior to 2010 are associated with multiple crimes in our records?

Question: Can you provide the count of 'CALLER' relations where the call duration was less than 2 minutes on 'December 25, 2022'?
Cypher:
MATCH (phone_call:PhoneCall)-[caller_relation:CALLER]->(phone:Phone)
WHERE phone_call.call_duration < 2 AND phone_call.call_date = date("2022-12-25")
RETURN COUNT(caller_relation)
Rewrite: Could you supply the number of 'CALLER' relations with a call duration under 2 minutes on 'December 25, 2022'?

Question: What is the average duration of phone calls from the number '07892233445' involved in criminal activities last year?
Cypher:
MATCH (phone:Phone {phoneNo:"07892233445"})<-[has_phone:HAS_PHONE]-(person:Person)-[party_to:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime)
WHERE crime.date.year = 2022
MATCH (phone)<-[called:CALLED]-(phone_call:PhoneCall)
RETURN AVG(phone_call.call_duration)
Rewrite: What was the typical length of phone calls made last year from the number '07892233445' that were linked to criminal activities?
